title: Bloomberg Markets: Marriott's Capuano Seeing Worldwide Growth
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Marriott's Capuano Seeing Worldwide Growth
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Anthony Capuano Executive Vice President and Chief Global Development Officer Marriott International Discussing Marriott's growth and development around the world, as well as educating consumers about the government's proposed travel ban.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
